Title: Prohibits residential landlords from charging tenants with fees for the payment of rent through an automated clearing house or online payment system
Summary: Prohibits residential landlords from charging tenants with fees for the payment of rent through an automated clearing house or online payment system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting residential landlords from charging tenants with fees for the payment of rent through an automated clearing house or online payment system
